sentences.en: A nearby volcano erupted violently, sending out a hail of molten rock and boiling mud.
sentences.cn: 附近的一座火山猛烈爆发了，喷出大量熔岩和滚烫的泥流。

sentences.en: Few people have been harmed physically by molten lava flowing from volcanoes.
sentences.cn: 被火山喷溢出的熔岩伤身体的人不多.

sentences.en: Molten metal ran out on to the flagstones.
sentences.cn: 熔化的金属溢流到外面的板石上.

sentences.en: Rising molten rock flows out on the ocean floor and caps the fissures, trapping the water.
sentences.cn: 上升熔岩流到海底并堵住了裂隙, 结果把海水封在里面.

sentences.en: Sparks of molten steel dash in all directions.
The fibre diameter increases with increasing fluidity of the molten oxide.
sentences.cn: 熔融氧化物的流化度增大,纤维直径增大.

sentences.en: The ground had opened to disgorge a boiling stream of molten lava.
sentences.cn: 大地开裂，汩汩冒出炽热的熔岩。

sentences.en: The molten lava ran down the mountain.
The molten metal is poured into the mould.
sentences.cn: 把熔化的金属倒入铸模。

sentences.en: The molten metal was run into a mould.
sentences.cn: 熔化的金属被倒进模内.

sentences.en: The volcano spewed a fountain of molten rock 650 feet in the air.
sentences.cn: 这座火山喷射出的岩浆高达650英尺。

sentences.en: The volcano vomited flames and molten rock.
sentences.cn: 火山喷出了火焰和熔岩.

sentences.en: The volcano was spurting out rivers of molten lava.
When molten steel cools, it changes into a solid.
sentences.cn: 当钢水冷却时, 它变为固体.

phrases.tran_cn: 玻璃液；熔化玻璃；熔融态玻璃
熔融金属；熔态金属；金属熔液

trans.tran_cn: 熔化的，熔融的，铸造的，浇铸的，灼热的
trans.tran_en: molten metal or rock has been made into a liquid by being heated to a very high temperature
